## QNRemoteAudioTrack.getRemoteVolume() method

获取音量

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getRemoteVolume(): number;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

number

音量值

## Remarks

获取当前 Track 播放的音量大小，只支持安卓
